sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>stone</radical> radical and <kanji>stone</kanji> kanji are the same thing!
meaningInfo: Know your radicals and therefore know your kanji. It's just that simple.
readingMnemonic: You throw a <kanji>stone</kanji> through a window... and, now you can see something very <reading>sexy</reading> (<ja>せき</ja>).
readingInfo: Whoops, maybe you shouldn't throw stones through windows or you'll see people's sexy times.
